name: LAMPHEAD
description:
LAMPHEAD game made for Global Game Jam 2020 in 48 hours

Waking up in a garbage dump it turns out that you are one of the last robots alive. To repair your friends, you have to go down to the trash cave, which always changes its shape. But you should hurry up, because your lamp-head goes dim every second...

development: https://play.google.com/store/apps/dev?id=7431267231822094169
art: https://www.artstation.com/mrak1099
